===Etymology===
From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=しゅぎ|主義|tr=tsyu<sup>X</sup> ngje<sup>H</sup>||principle, set belief}}. The word was already in use in Chinese with this meaning in the {{m|zh|史記|tr=Shǐjì||''[[w:Records of the Grand Historian|Records of the Grand Historian]]''}}, completed around 100 BCE.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|y=ko|しゅぎ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しゅぎ}}

# a [[principle]] or set of principles; a [[doctrine]]; an [[ism]]
#: {{ja-usex|あの人は'''主%義'''に基づいて契%約を拒%絶するはずです。|^あの ひと は '''しゅ%ぎ''' に もとづいて けい%やく を きょ%ぜつ する はず です。|I expect they will reject the contract on '''principle'''.}}
